recipeIngredient: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 1 onion until it changes colour.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 1 onion until it changes colour.

recipeInstructions.text: add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 tsp chilli. saute well.
recipeInstructions.name: add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 tsp chilli. saute well.

recipeInstructions.text: now add 3 tbsp peas and 3 tbsp sweet corn. saute and cook until they are almost cooked yet hold their shape.
recipeInstructions.name: now add 3 tbsp peas and 3 tbsp sweet corn. saute and cook until they are almost cooked yet hold their shape.

recipeInstructions.text: further, add 3 boiled and mashed potato. i have pressure cooked potato for 4 whistles.
recipeInstructions.name: further, add 3 boiled and mashed potato. i have pressure cooked potato for 4 whistles.

recipeInstructions.text: also add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp garam masala, ½ tsp aamchur and ½ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: also add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp garam masala, ½ tsp aamchur and ½ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well until the spices are well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well until the spices are well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: furthermore, add 3 tbsp panner and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: furthermore, add 3 tbsp panner and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: additionally, add 2 tbsp coriander and mix well. allow to cool the stuffing completely.
recipeInstructions.name: additionally, add 2 tbsp coriander and mix well. allow to cool the stuffing completely.

recipeInstructions.text: furthermore, take bread slices and cut the sides.
recipeInstructions.name: furthermore, take bread slices and cut the sides.

recipeInstructions.text: dip the bread slice into the water just for a second and squeeze off the excess water.
recipeInstructions.name: dip the bread slice into the water just for a second and squeeze off the excess water.

recipeInstructions.text: make sure to squeeze the bread slice completely else it will absorb oil while deep frying.
recipeInstructions.name: make sure to squeeze the bread slice completely else it will absorb oil while deep frying.

recipeInstructions.text: place the cylindrical shaped prepared stuffing.
recipeInstructions.name: place the cylindrical shaped prepared stuffing.

recipeInstructions.text: and wrap the bread making sure to pinch the edges and secure tight. if unable to hold the shape dip your finger in water and make bread flexible to hold and roll.
recipeInstructions.name: and wrap the bread making sure to pinch the edges and secure tight. if unable to hold the shape dip your finger in water and make bread flexible to hold and roll.

recipeInstructions.text: further, with the help of both hands roll and make a cylindrical shape.
recipeInstructions.name: further, with the help of both hands roll and make a cylindrical shape.

recipeInstructions.text: deep fry the prepared bread roll into the hot oil. make sure to fry in hot oil, else bread will absorb oil and turn soggy.
recipeInstructions.name: deep fry the prepared bread roll into the hot oil. make sure to fry in hot oil, else bread will absorb oil and turn soggy.

recipeInstructions.text: stir and fry occasionally on medium flame till it turns golden brown. alternatively, bake the bread to golden brown if you are diet conscious.
recipeInstructions.name: stir and fry occasionally on medium flame till it turns golden brown. alternatively, bake the bread to golden brown if you are diet conscious.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve stuffed bread roll hot along with ketchup.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve stuffed bread roll hot along with ketchup.

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large kadai take 5 cup milk. use good quality milk for more creamy texture.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a large kadai take 5 cup milk. use good quality milk for more creamy texture.

recipeInstructions.text: stir occasionally to prevent milk from sticking to bottom.
recipeInstructions.name: stir occasionally to prevent milk from sticking to bottom.

recipeInstructions.text: get the milk to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: get the milk to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: stir continuously, and the milk thickens in 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: stir continuously, and the milk thickens in 8 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: after 20 minutes, the milk turns creamy texture.
recipeInstructions.name: after 20 minutes, the milk turns creamy texture.

recipeInstructions.text: keep stirring on low flame, to prevent milk from burning.
recipeInstructions.name: keep stirring on low flame, to prevent milk from burning.

recipeInstructions.text: after 40 minutes, thick texture of milk is formed.
recipeInstructions.name: after 40 minutes, thick texture of milk is formed.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ¼ cup sugar. add more sugar if you prefer.
recipeInstructions.name: now add ¼ cup sugar. add more sugar if you prefer.

recipeInstructions.text: keep stirring till the sugar dissolves.
recipeInstructions.name: keep stirring till the sugar dissolves.

recipeInstructions.text: continue to cook on low flame till the mixture separates from the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: continue to cook on low flame till the mixture separates from the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve palkova hot / chilled or make peda and serve.

recipeInstructions.name: how to make stuffing for lollipop:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a large bowl take 3 potato. make sure to boil the potato and cool it completely before using it.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a large bowl take 3 potato. make sure to boil the potato and cool it completely before using it.

itemListElement.text: also add ½ onion, 3 tbsp capsicum, ½ carrot, 3 tbsp sweet corn and 2 clove garlic.
itemListElement.name: also add ½ onion, 3 tbsp capsicum, ½ carrot, 3 tbsp sweet corn and 2 clove garlic.

itemListElement.text: further add ½ tsp mixed herbs, ¼ tsp pepper powder, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp garam masala and ½ tsp salt.
itemListElement.name: further add ½ tsp mixed herbs, ¼ tsp pepper powder, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp garam masala and ½ tsp salt.

itemListElement.text: add 3 tbsp spring onion, ¼ cup breadcrumbs and mix well. breadcrumbs help to absorb the moisture and prevent it from breaking while frying.
itemListElement.name: add 3 tbsp spring onion, ¼ cup breadcrumbs and mix well. breadcrumbs help to absorb the moisture and prevent it from breaking while frying.

itemListElement.text: form a soft dough adding breadcrumbs if required.
itemListElement.name: form a soft dough adding breadcrumbs if required.

itemListElement.text: now pinch a ball sized dough and roll uniformly. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: ಮೊದಲಿಗೆ, ಉದ್ದನೆಯ ಹಸಿರು ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿ ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಂಡು ಮಧ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಸೀಳಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ. ಮೆಣಸಿನಕಾಯಿಯನ್ನು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಕತ್ತರಿಸದೆ ಸೀಳಿ.

recipeIngredient: 1½ cup 260 grams maida / plain flour / refined flour / all purpose flour

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take ¾ cup curd, ¾ cup sugar, ½ cup oil and 1 tsp vanilla extract.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take ¾ cup curd, ¾ cup sugar, ½ cup oil and 1 tsp vanilla extract.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well with the help of whisk.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well with the help of whisk.

recipeInstructions.text: further sieve 1½ cup maida, ¼ tsp baking soda and 1 tsp baking powder.
recipeInstructions.name: further sieve 1½ cup maida, ¼ tsp baking soda and 1 tsp baking powder.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well using cut and fold method.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well using cut and fold method.

recipeInstructions.text: further add ¼ cup water and mix well forming thick flowing consistency batter.
recipeInstructions.name: further add ¼ cup water and mix well forming thick flowing consistency batter.

recipeInstructions.text: add in ¼ cup of tutti frutti and give a good mix.
recipeInstructions.name: add in ¼ cup of tutti frutti and give a good mix.

recipeInstructions.text: further, transfer the cake batter into the cake mould or bread mould (width: 12 cm, height: 6 cm, length: 26 cm). make sure to grease the mould with butter to avoid sticking and line butter paper at bottom of tray.
recipeInstructions.name: further, transfer the cake batter into the cake mould or bread mould (width: 12 cm, height: 6 cm, length: 26 cm). make sure to grease the mould with butter to avoid sticking and line butter paper at bottom of tray.

recipeInstructions.text: level up the batter and pat the tray twice to remove the air incorporated into the batter.
recipeInstructions.name: level up the batter and pat the tray twice to remove the air incorporated into the batter.

recipeInstructions.text: place the cake tray into preheated oven. bake the cake at 180 degree celsius or 356 degree fahrenheit for 30-40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: place the cake tray into preheated oven. bake the cake at 180 degree celsius or 356 degree fahrenheit for 30-40 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve the tutti frutti cake or store in airtight container.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve the tutti frutti cake or store in airtight container.

recipeInstructions.text: prepare a smooth lump free batter adding more water if required.

recipeInstructions.text: now dip an onion ring into maida paste and coat well.

@graph.description: Easy Palak Paneer Recipe | Spinach Paneer Curry Restaurant Style

recipeInstructions.text: Firstly, in large vessel get the water to a rolling boil. Once the water comes to a boil, add 1 bunch palak.
recipeInstructions.name: Firstly, in large vessel get the water to a rolling boil. Once the water comes to a boil, add 1 bunch palak.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the flame and dip the palak into boiling water completely.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn off the flame and dip the palak into boiling water completely.

recipeInstructions.text: Rest the palak in hot water for 2 minutes or until the leaves are blanched well.
recipeInstructions.name: Rest the palak in hot water for 2 minutes or until the leaves are blanched well.

recipeInstructions.text: Immediately, drop the palak leaves into ice-cold water. This helps to retain bright green colour.
recipeInstructions.name: Immediately, drop the palak leaves into ice-cold water. This helps to retain bright green colour.

recipeInstructions.text: Now transfer the blanched palak into the mixer jar.
recipeInstructions.name: Now transfer the blanched palak into the mixer jar.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 cloves garlic, 1 inch ginger, and 3 chilli.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2 cloves garlic, 1 inch ginger, and 3 chilli.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend to smooth puree without adding any water. keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend to smooth puree without adding any water. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil, 1 tsp butter, 1 dried red chilli, 1 tsp cumin and 1 bay leaf. saute on low flame until the spices turn aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil, 1 tsp butter, 1 dried red chilli, 1 tsp cumin and 1 bay leaf. saute on low flame until the spices turn aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute until onions turn golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute until onions turn golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Further keeping the flame on low, add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp coriander powder and 1 tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Further keeping the flame on low, add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp coriander powder and 1 tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Saute until the spices turn aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: Saute until the spices turn aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add few capsicum and saute until the capsicum shrinks slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add few capsicum and saute until the capsicum shrinks slightly.

recipeInstructions.text: Further, add 1 tomato and cook until the tomato turns soft and mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Further, add 1 tomato and cook until the tomato turns soft and mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add in prepared palak puree and cook well.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add in prepared palak puree and cook well.

recipeInstructions.text: Also, add 1 cup water and adjust the consistency as required.
recipeInstructions.name: Also, add 1 cup water and adjust the consistency as required.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add 1 tbsp cream and 1 tbsp paneer. Mix well making sure the consistency is attained as required.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add 1 tbsp cream and 1 tbsp paneer. Mix well making sure the consistency is attained as required.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 250 grams paneer and simmer for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 250 grams paneer and simmer for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Also, add ½ tsp garam masala and 1 tsp kasuri methi. mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Also, add ½ tsp garam masala and 1 tsp kasuri methi. mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Finally, enjoy Palak Paneer Recipe with roti or rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Finally, enjoy Palak Paneer Recipe with roti or rice.

recipeInstructions.text: ಉಂಡೆ ಮುಕ್ತ ಹಿಟ್ಟನ್ನು ರೂಪಿಸಲು ಚೆನ್ನಾಗಿ ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ.

recipeInstructions.text: ಉದಾರ ಪ್ರಮಾಣದ ಪಿಜ್ಜಾ ಸಾಸ್‌ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಟಾಪ್ ಮಾಡಿ, ಏಕರೂಪವಾಗಿ ಹರಡಿ.

@graph.name: sandwich chutney recipe | green chutney for sandwich | mint chutney for sandwich
@graph.description: easy sandwich chutney recipe | green chutney for sandwich | mint chutney for sandwich

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a small blender take 1 cup coriander, ½ cup mint, 2 tbsp peanuts, 1 inch ginger, 3 clove garlic, 3 green chilli and 2 tbsp lemon.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a small blender take 1 cup coriander, ½ cup mint, 2 tbsp peanuts, 1 inch ginger, 3 clove garlic, 3 green chilli and 2 tbsp lemon.

recipeInstructions.text: also add ½ tsp jeera, ½ tsp chaat masala, ¼ tsp sugar and ¼ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: also add ½ tsp jeera, ½ tsp chaat masala, ¼ tsp sugar and ¼ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: blend to smooth paste adding ¼ cup water or as required.
recipeInstructions.name: blend to smooth paste adding ¼ cup water or as required.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, store sandwich chutney in a jar or prepare sandwich placing cucumber.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, store sandwich chutney in a jar or prepare sandwich placing cucumber.

recipeInstructions.text: Firstly, in a mixer jar take ½ cup instant coffee powder and ½ cup sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Firstly, in a mixer jar take ½ cup instant coffee powder and ½ cup sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse and grind to a fine powder. You can also use hand beater to make coffee.
recipeInstructions.name: Pulse and grind to a fine powder. You can also use hand beater to make coffee.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add 4 ice cubes, pulse, and blend.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add 4 ice cubes, pulse, and blend.

recipeInstructions.text: Scrape in between to prevent heating and uniform grinding.
recipeInstructions.name: Scrape in between to prevent heating and uniform grinding.

recipeInstructions.text: Continue to pulse and grind until the mixture turns thick and frothy. Also, you can notice the mixture has turned light brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Continue to pulse and grind until the mixture turns thick and frothy. Also, you can notice the mixture has turned light brown.

recipeInstructions.text: You can store the cappuccino mixture in an airtight box for a week in the refrigerator.

recipeInstructions.text: To make coffee, take 1 tbsp of prepared cappuccino mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in hot milk and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a small bowl take 1 tbsp toor dal, 1 tsp raw rice, 1 tsp coriander seeds and ½ tsp cumin.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a small bowl take 1 tbsp toor dal, 1 tsp raw rice, 1 tsp coriander seeds and ½ tsp cumin.

recipeInstructions.text: add ½ cup hot water and soak for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: add ½ cup hot water and soak for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: now transfer the soaked dal to a blender along with water.
recipeInstructions.name: now transfer the soaked dal to a blender along with water.

recipeInstructions.text: add ½ cup coconut, grated, few curry leaves, 1 chilli and 1 inch ginger.
recipeInstructions.name: add ½ cup coconut, grated, few curry leaves, 1 chilli and 1 inch ginger.

recipeInstructions.text: blend to smooth paste adding water if required.
recipeInstructions.name: blend to smooth paste adding water if required.

recipeInstructions.text: take the coconut mixture to a large bowl along with 1 cup curd.
recipeInstructions.name: take the coconut mixture to a large bowl along with 1 cup curd.

recipeInstructions.text: whisk well making sure to have a silky smooth consistency. keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: whisk well making sure to have a silky smooth consistency. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: in a large kadai heat 1 tbsp coconut oil and add 250 grams okra.
recipeInstructions.name: in a large kadai heat 1 tbsp coconut oil and add 250 grams okra.

recipeInstructions.text: roast on medium flame stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: roast on medium flame stirring occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: cook until the okra turns non-sticky and also changes colour slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: cook until the okra turns non-sticky and also changes colour slightly.

recipeInstructions.text: keep the fried okra aside.
recipeInstructions.name: keep the fried okra aside.

recipeInstructions.text: in the same kadai heat 1 tbsp coconut oil and splutter 1 tsp mustard, ½ tsp cumin, ¼ tsp methi, 1 dried red chilli, pinch hing, few curry leaves and ¼ tsp turmeric.
recipeInstructions.name: in the same kadai heat 1 tbsp coconut oil and splutter 1 tsp mustard, ½ tsp cumin, ¼ tsp methi, 1 dried red chilli, pinch hing, few curry leaves and ¼ tsp turmeric.

recipeInstructions.text: saute and splutter the tempering.
recipeInstructions.name: saute and splutter the tempering.

recipeInstructions.text: now pour in prepared coconut curd mixture and add ¾ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: now pour in prepared coconut curd mixture and add ¾ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well making sure everything is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well making sure everything is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: further, add in fried okra and give a good mix.
recipeInstructions.name: further, add in fried okra and give a good mix.

recipeInstructions.text: simmer and boil for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: simmer and boil for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: adjust the consistency as required adding water if required.
recipeInstructions.name: adjust the consistency as required adding water if required.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, enjoy vendakkai mor kuzhambu with hot steamed rice.

recipeInstructions.text: सबसे पहले, एक बड़े कटोरे में 1 कप बेसन और ¼ कप चावल का आटा लें।
recipeInstructions.name: सबसे पहले, एक बड़े कटोरे में 1 कप बेसन और ¼ कप चावल का आटा लें।

recipeInstructions.text: ¼ टीस्पून हल्दी, ½ टीस्पून मिर्च पाउडर, 2 टीस्पून तिल, ¼ टीस्पून अजवाइन और 1 टीस्पून जीरा डालें।
recipeInstructions.name: ¼ टीस्पून हल्दी, ½ टीस्पून मिर्च पाउडर, 2 टीस्पून तिल, ¼ टीस्पून अजवाइन और 1 टीस्पून जीरा डालें।

recipeInstructions.text: 1 टीस्पून अदरक लहसुन पेस्ट, 1 मिर्च, ½ टीस्पून नमक और 2 टीस्पून तेल भी डालें।
recipeInstructions.name: 1 टीस्पून अदरक लहसुन पेस्ट, 1 मिर्च, ½ टीस्पून नमक और 2 टीस्पून तेल भी डालें।

recipeInstructions.text: सुनिश्चित करें कि सभी मसाले अच्छी तरह से संयोजित है।
recipeInstructions.name: सुनिश्चित करें कि सभी मसाले अच्छी तरह से संयोजित है।

recipeInstructions.text: अब ½ कप पानी डालें और बैटर तैयार करें।
recipeInstructions.name: अब ½ कप पानी डालें और बैटर तैयार करें।

recipeInstructions.text: आवश्यकतानुसार पानी डालकर एक स्मूथ गाढ़ा पेस्ट बनाएं। एक तरफ रखें।
recipeInstructions.name: आवश्यकतानुसार पानी डालकर एक स्मूथ गाढ़ा पेस्ट बनाएं। एक तरफ रखें।

recipeInstructions.text: बड़े आकार के पालक पत्तियां लें और बेसन बैटर फैलाएं।
recipeInstructions.name: बड़े आकार के पालक पत्तियां लें और बेसन बैटर फैलाएं।

recipeInstructions.text: पत्तियों और बेसन बैटर को कम से कम 3 लेयर में दोहराएं।
recipeInstructions.name: पत्तियों और बेसन बैटर को कम से कम 3 लेयर में दोहराएं।

recipeInstructions.text: अब टाइट रोल करें और सुनिश्चित करें कि सभी लेयर बरकरार हैं।
recipeInstructions.name: अब टाइट रोल करें और सुनिश्चित करें कि सभी लेयर बरकरार हैं।

recipeInstructions.text: इसके अलावा, रोल पर थोड़ा बेसन बैटर फैलाएं।
recipeInstructions.name: इसके अलावा, रोल पर थोड़ा बेसन बैटर फैलाएं।

recipeInstructions.text: मध्यम फ्लेम पर 15 मिनट के लिए स्टीमर में स्टीम करें।
recipeInstructions.name: मध्यम फ्लेम पर 15 मिनट के लिए स्टीमर में स्टीम करें।

recipeInstructions.text: रोल को ठंडा करें। आप फ्राइंग के बिना पालक वडी को खा सकते हैं। हालांकि, तला हुआ अच्छा स्वाद देते है।

recipeInstructions.text: अब पैन पर 2 टेबलस्पून तेल गर्म करें और उबले हुए पालक रोल रखें।
recipeInstructions.name: अब पैन पर 2 टेबलस्पून तेल गर्म करें और उबले हुए पालक रोल रखें।

recipeInstructions.text: मध्यम फ्लेम पर भूनें।

recipeInstructions.text: रोल सुनहरा और कुरकुरा होने तक फ्लिप करके फ्राई करें। अब 1 टीस्पून तिल के बीज छिड़कें और यह सर्व करने के लिए तैयार है।

recipeInstructions.text: अंत में, पालक पत्रा रेसिपी या कुरकुरा पालक रोल को नारियल के साथ टॉप करें और इसका आनंद लें।
